name: Country Music io (opoly)
description:
Country Music io combines the fun of a property trading game with your favorite Country artist from today and the past. Play with family, friends or your device and find out how much fun Country Music io is today!

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
